keyMoments.title: Curly Dadan's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Dadan is introduced as the leader of a mountain bandit family on Mt. Colubo. Garp brings young Luffy to her, forcing her to raise him alongside Ace by threatening to expose her illegal activities.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Dadan as the foster mother who raised both Luffy and Ace, providing crucial context for their childhood bond.
keyMoments.quote: I can't possibly raise both of them!

relationships.description: Forced by Garp to raise young Luffy, serving as his foster mother on Mt. Colubo.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp brings Luffy to Dadan, coercing her to take care of him alongside Ace.

relationships.description: Raised Ace before Luffy arrived, serving as his foster mother under Garp's orders.
Garp forces Dadan to raise Ace and Luffy by threatening to expose her criminal activities to the authorities.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp threatens Dadan with arrest if she refuses to take care of Luffy.

reveals.information: Leader of the Dadan Family mountain bandits and foster mother to Ace and Luffy
Operates illegal mountain bandit activities that Garp knows about and uses as leverage

keyMoments.title: Dogra's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Dogra appears as one of the mountain bandits of the Dadan Family when Garp arrives with Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the key members of the bandit family who will be part of Luffy and Ace's childhood environment.

relationships.description: Member of the Dadan Family, serving under Curly Dadan.

reveals.information: Member of the Dadan Family mountain bandits

keyMoments.title: Magra's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Magra appears as one of the mountain bandits of the Dadan Family when Garp arrives with Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the key members of the bandit family who will be part of Luffy and Ace's childhood environment.

relationships.description: Member of the Dadan Family, serving under Curly Dadan.

reveals.information: Member of the Dadan Family mountain bandits

keyMoments.title: Luffy Meets Ace
keyMoments.description: Young Luffy (age 7) meets 10-year-old Ace for the first time at Dadan's house, beginning their brotherhood.
keyMoments.significance: The start of one of the most important relationships in the series.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Decides to Follow Ace
keyMoments.description: Despite Ace's hostility, young Luffy decides to persistently follow him every day to become friends.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's determination and unwavering spirit even as a child.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Discovers Gray Terminal
keyMoments.description: After three months of following Ace through dangerous terrain, Luffy finally reaches Gray Terminal.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy discovers the location where he will meet Sabo and where much of his childhood adventures take place.

relationships.description: Meets Ace for the first time and persistently pursues his friendship despite initial hostility.

evolutionMoments.description: First meeting between Luffy and Ace at Dadan's house, beginning their journey to brotherhood.

relationships.description: Dadan becomes Luffy's foster mother when Garp brings him to Mt. Colubo.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp leaves Luffy in Dadan's care.

reveals.information: Flashback reveals Luffy was brought to live with Dadan by Garp at age 7, ten years before the main story
Even as a child, Luffy displayed extraordinary determination and persistence in pursuing friendship with Ace for three months

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Meets Luffy
keyMoments.description: 10-year-old Ace meets young Luffy for the first time and shows immediate hostility toward him.
keyMoments.significance: Beginning of the legendary brotherhood, showing how it started with animosity.

keyMoments.title: Ace Tests Luffy for Three Months
keyMoments.description: Ace attempts to discourage Luffy by leading him through deadly hazards including crocodile-filled rivers, wild tigers and bears, and venomous snakes.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ace's initial isolation and his testing of Luffy's resolve to be his friend.

relationships.description: Meets Luffy for the first time and initially shows hostility, though he secretly allows Luffy to keep following him.

evolutionMoments.description: First meeting with Luffy, showing initial hostility and attempts to discourage friendship.

relationships.description: Raised by Dadan on Mt. Colubo under Garp's orders before Luffy's arrival.

reveals.information: Flashback reveals Ace was already living with Dadan before Luffy arrived, and was 10 years old when they first met
Young Ace was hostile and isolated, actively trying to discourage Luffy from following him by taking dangerous routes

keyMoments.title: Garp Brings Luffy to Dadan
keyMoments.description: In a flashback ten years prior, Garp brings young Luffy to Dadan's house on Mt. Colubo, forcing her to raise him alongside Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Garp's role in arranging for both Ace and Luffy to be raised together, setting up their brotherhood.

relationships.description: Garp forces Dadan to raise both Ace and Luffy by threatening to expose her criminal activities.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp coerces Dadan into taking care of Luffy by threatening arrest.

reveals.information: Garp arranged for both Ace and Luffy to be raised by Dadan on Mt. Colubo, using his knowledge of her illegal activities as leverage
